item.title: NEM
item.description: score:-43 Chances: Newmont Corp. is well-positioned to benefit from the recent surge in gold prices, which has reached an all-time high of $2,135 per ounce. The company’s diverse geographical segments, including North America and South America, provide a strong foundation for future growth and exploration opportunities.
